ItemDesc: When used, the ally character with the highest current ATK deals <unbreak>35%</unbreak> more DMG in the next battle, and their likelihood of being attacked by enemy targets is increased greatly.
ItemBGDesc: Go ahead, flash your sharp knives, cut my feeble heartstrings, nail me to my coffin and bury me. Rock 'n' roll will never die. I will return with a song, and become the roar in the lowest depths of your nightmares.\n\n"You can kill the guitar, but you can never bury the roar of fury."
